amendment.description: An amendment numbered 38 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to grant the Army Corps the authority to repair or replace bridges in New England that serve as emergency evacuation routes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Keating.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
